title: How to Make a Simple Paper Lantern

steps.headline: Get an A4 paper; the width of your paper will be the height of your lantern.
steps.description: Use a piece of paper that suits you. This paper can even be a decorated one, it really depends on your personality; whether you are a sporty type or a techno geek or others. So make sure you choose the right tools.

steps.headline: Fold the paper in half.
steps.description: Make sure the upper length of your paper is connected to the bottom length of your paper.

steps.headline: Cut the folded part of the paper, inch by inch.
Roll the paper gently (the width of the paper facing you).
Glue the paper along the length-wise edge and put the two ends together.
Have fun playing with your paper lantern.

text: Get an A4 paper; the width of your paper will be the height of your lantern. Use a piece of paper that suits you. This paper can even be a decorated one, it really depends on your personality; whether you are a sporty type or a techno geek or others. So make sure you choose the right tools. Fold the paper in half. Make sure the upper length of your paper is connected to the bottom length of your paper. Cut the folded part of the paper, inch by inch.  Unfold the paper.  Roll the paper gently (the width of the paper facing you).  Glue the paper along the length-wise edge and put the two ends together.  Have fun playing with your paper lantern.
